line_2: Down go the pyramids of Porcellane.

line_1: Desponding fops resign the clouded cane:
line_2: Smarts, pedants, as she smiles, no more are vain;

line_1: And the nice Conduct of a clouded Cane)
line_2: (Sir Plume, of Amber Snuff-box justly vain,

line_1: Has God then giv'n its sweetness to the cane
line_2: Unless his laws be trampled on — in vain?

line_1: Supple and flexible as Indian cane,
line_2: To take the bend his appetites ordain,
